qas.question: When Gaddafi staged his coup, did he need to use a great show of violence?

answers.text: They met no serious resistance, and wielded little violence against the monarchists.

qas.question: When did Gaddafi decide to stage his coup?

answers.text: In mid-1969, Idris travelled abroad to spend the summer in Turkey and Greece.

qas.question: What did Gaddafi seize during the coup?

answers.text: Gaddafi took control of the Berka barracks in Benghazi,

qas.question: What did Hameidi do during the coup?

answers.text: Hameidi was sent to arrest crown prince Sayyid Hasan ar-Rida al-Mahdi as-Sanussi, and force him to relinquish his claim to the throne.

qas.question: What countries did Idris visit in the summer of 1969?
What was the code name for Gaddafi's coup against the monarchy?
What leader's forces occupied the barracks in Tripoli?
Who arrested Sayyid Hasan ar-Rida al-Mahdi as-Sanussi?
What revolutionary leader took control of the anti-aircraft equipment in Tripoli?

context: <a1_0>In mid-1969, Idris travelled abroad to spend the summer in <a5_0>Turkey and Greece<a5_0/>.<a1_0/> Gaddafi's Free Officers recognized this as their chance to overthrow the monarchy, initiating "<a2_0><a6_0>Operation Jerusalem<a6_0/><a2_0/>". On 1 September, they occupied airports, police depots, radio stations and government offices in Tripoli and Benghazi. <a3_0>Gaddafi took control of the Berka barracks in Benghazi,<a3_0/> while <a7_0>Omar Meheisha<a7_0/> occupied Tripoli barracks and <a9_0>Jalloud<a9_0/> seized the city's anti-aircraft batteries. <a8_0>Khweldi <a4_0>Hameidi<a8_0/> was sent to arrest crown prince Sayyid Hasan ar-Rida al-Mahdi as-Sanussi, and force him to relinquish his claim to the throne.<a4_0/> <a0_0>They met no serious resistance, and wielded little violence against the monarchists.
